Choose the background for your quotes

Thank you for downloading my app. My intention is for this to be a small companion to other sorts of therapy, as well as being some practice for me as a new developer. I\'ve struggled with varying levels of mental illness since I was a young child and understand how sometimes you just something small to help get you through your day (or night). As silly as it sounds, sometimes reading some motivational quotes would help pull me out of down periods. My hope is that this app can do that for you.\n\n -Daniel
